org.apache.manifoldcf.core.system

Class Logging

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.core.system.Logging
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Logging, Logging

    public class Logging
extends Object
    This class furnishes the logging environment for the JSKW application.
